AUDIKA ALICANTE GROUP 2020

Jette Toft Borner

From 14th to 18th June, 2020


ALICANTE

Alicante has 218km of coastline with beautiful beaches and 330 days of sunshine per year.

Its airport is very well connected with all Europe. You can see in the picture below the Alicante’s Airport in black and all the destinations with direct flight.

The two hotels we are suggesting, Asia Gardens and SH Villa Gadea, are located less than one hour from the Airport and they are close to the beach and the cities but both are like oasis in the midle of the nature. The location of these two hotels offer a lot of activity options: sea, mountain, sports, cultural…



SUGGESTED HOTELS

ASIA GARDENS


AUDIKA GROUP ACCOMMODATION:

We will have 125 Deluxe Rooms, these rooms have 34m2 and a terrace of 8m2, with views of the botanical gardens, swimming pools and/or mountains. Equipped with the latest technology including a 43" Full HD LED TV. A king-size or twin beds, spacious bathrooms with japanese panels with double wash basins, separate bath and shower.

MEETING FACILITIES:

Following the request, we propose the following meeting rooms for AUDIKA meetings:

  • Plenary room Shanghai 4 + 5 (340m2) with natural light, up to 125pax in cabaret style

  • Breakout room Shanghai 2 (104m2) natural light.

DINNERS:

Asia Gardens is a big hotel so it has a lot of possibilities to organize meetings, work lunches and dinners in different spaces. We propose for the welcome dinner on June 14th, the Saigon Terrace where we can organize an informal dinner: Buffet or BBQ style.

For the Gala dinner on June 17th we propose La Palapa restaurant located in the pool’s area.

SH VILLAGADEA


AUDIKA GROUP ACCOMMODATION:

We will have 125 Standard Rooms. The standard rooms is an elegant 32m2 room (terrace included) with mediterranean style with a spacious bathroom. These rooms have views to the mountains or the gardens, not sea views.

MEETING FACILITIES:

Following the request, we propose the following meeting rooms for AUDIKA meetings:

DINNERS:

The idea would be to organize the welcome dinner on June 14th near the pool, maybe a BBQ dinner, having as backup the Veranda restaurant.

For the Gala dinner on June 17th we propose the Palapa room, we would need to change the set up and the decoration but is a beautiful space perfect for a Gala dinner and we can use the same stage and AV used for the meetings. See a dinner set up at La Palapa:

TERMS & CONDITIONS

  • Rates valid for the requested dates (June 14th to 18th,2020).

  • For a group of minimum 115 pax.

  • Cutting Edge Events management fee including in the detailed rates

  • VAT included.

  • No reservation has been done. Availability upon request.

  • Hotel Asia Gardens offer will be valid only if you contract 1 f&b service (lunch or dinner) per day for the whole group.
